coverage_details.accommodation: Standard Suite (Single/Private Room at IMC and Dr. Suleiman Habib Medical centers; Private Room at Dr. Suleiman Habib & Saad Specialist Hospital)
coverage_details.vaccination: Covered up to Annual Limit (as per MOH schedule)
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame limit SR 400.00 (as part of optical limit)
coverage_details.bone_marrow_transplant: Up to 3 cases max. per policy period
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Heart, liver, and kidney covered. Medication limit equals pre-authorization approval.
coverage_details.dental_general: Consultation, simple & surgical extractions, antibiotics, root canal treatment, fillings, X-rays (small and panoramic, approved during policy period), pulpotomy, and appropriate medication up to the benefit sub-limit; Dental Scaling is covered and pulpotomy is covered
coverage_details.congenital: Covered up to Annual Limit; subject to policy aggregate limit SR 150,000.00 for congenital diseases/deformities for all beneficiaries; congenital deformity and birth defects covered for newborn babies up to policy max limit.
coverage_details.optical: SR 500.00; no age restriction, benefit covers up to SR 400.00 for frames
coverage_details.disability_cases: SR 100,000.00 and covered up to benefits sub-limit as per CCHI
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for VVIP members for outpatient & in-patient services except for outpatient services with limits, dental, hearing aids, pregnancy, kidney dialysis, optical; Medication limit equals pre-authorization approval limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Developmental cases covered. Up to 3 bone marrow transplants per policy. Treatment of allergies, Diabetes Insulin Pump (children under 8, adults over 60 with memory/Alzheimer), Up to 200 parents/collaterals, Five post-IVF cases per policy period, In-house clinics' medications up to SR 500,000 covered (discounted), Knee replacement after trauma covered, Disability/RTA injuries per CCHI, Newborns covered from birth, Psoriasis treatment covered, Hospital isolation covered, Road Traffic Accident injuries covered per CCHI. If appropriate provider not available, Bupa will refer to another network. In-house clinics: Afia International Co., United Sugar Co., Panda. Optical benefit - age limt waived. Parents & Collaterals limited to 200. Covers cost for in-house clinics including medicines.
